item.title: nAma-vAda rise
item.description:
Source: TW

Thread by @gorakhvacha on Thread Reader App – Thread Reader App

While the ingredients for the superlative position of naam-vaad were already present in pre 13th century agama-purana literature, I believe we see a massive third movement emerging in the pancharatrikas(and adjacents) going full blown by the 16th century wrecking the post.

Matsyendra world of yogin-s and rasasiddhas that itself emerged in a similar superlative positioning of hathayoga over mantramarga.

item.title: तन्त्र-विभागे मधुलिका
item.description:
Source: TW

Questions and quest

“Tantra is bad” … “Isn’t tantra harmful?”….. “Tantra is done to cause harm”…. “Tantra is not the right path”. These are some of the many comments that motivated me to write about Tantra! I realized people just listen to what others are expounding and add their layers of fear and confusion in relation to things they do not understand. As a result, stories that are misconceptions and sometimes, a total misrepresentation of the concept and entity become popular. The same subjective layering of fear and confusion have warped the story of tantra.
